Message_Content__c: Congratulations on your QUT offer!  If you haven't responded, we'll call and help.  We look forward to speaking with you soon.
Thanks for accepting your QUT offer!  You'll need to enrol to get your student login and to get started at QUT.  Need help?  Call HiQ on 07 3138 2000.
QUT called to congratulate you and see if you had questions about your QUT offer. No need to call us, we'll call you one more time.
QUT's Final Call Attempt. Sorry we missed you.  Remember to Respond to your Offer. Need help? Call HiQ on 07 3138 2000.
We're calling to welcome you to QUT. No need to call us, we'll call one more time.
QUT calling again. Please refer to your 'Welcome to QUT' email for vital steps and information to get you started. Need help? Call HiQ on 07 3138 2000.
QUT called to see if you had questions about responding to your QUT offer. No need to call us, we’ll call you one more time.
QUT calling again, no need to call us. Refer to your offer email to correctly respond to your offer.
We’re calling to assist you in finalising your acceptance to study at QUT. No need to call us, we’ll call one more time.
QUT calling again. To finalise your acceptance, click 'Enrol at QUT' and follow the instructions on the QUT welcome page. Need help? Call HiQ on 07 3138 2000.
